title: Manu Dibango: African saxophone legend dies of Covid-19
description: Manu Dibango, the 86-year-old African jazz legend, dies in Paris after catching the coronavirus.
content:
Image copyrightAFP
The African saxophone legend Manu Dibango has died in Paris after catching coronavirus.
Dibango best known for his 1972 song Soul Makossa is one of the first global stars to die from Covid-19. 
The 86-year-old fused jazz and funk music w… [+970 chars]

content:
PARIS -- Manu Dibango, who fused African rhythms with funk to become one of the most influential musicians in world dance music, died Tuesday with the coronavirus, according to his music publisher. He was 86.
